Comparison of outcomes after HLA-haploidentical stem cell transplantation using posttransplantation cyclophosphamide (PTCY) and unrelated allogeneic stem cell transplantation.
Patients receiving HLA haploidentical stem cell transplantation with posttransplantation cyclophosphamide or unrelated stem cell transplantation.
To compare the outcomes after HLA-haploidentical stem cell transplantation using posttransplantation cyclophosphamide (PTCY) and unrelated allogeneic stem cell transplantation.
Retrospective comparative analysis and a decision analysis
Patients who receive HLA-haploidentical stem cell transplantation or unrelated stem cell transplantation between 2012 and 2015
the Japan Agency for Medical Research and Development
